# SmolVLA Training Configuration: No URDF needed - direct joint space control

smolvla_training.# Key advantage: SmolVLA works directly with joint positions - no kinematic models required

# Recommended Tasks: Good bimanual tasks for SmolVLA training
recommended_tasks: Pick object with left arm, place in right hand
Sorting tasks (each arm handles different types)

data_collection.camera_consistency: Keep external cameras fixed during recording

model_training.start_simple: Begin with single-arm tasks, progress to bimanual
model_training.batch_size: Start with 32, increase if GPU memory allows
model_training.validation: Test on unseen object positions and orientations

deployment.safety: Test in simulation first if available
deployment.monitoring: Watch for coordination failures between arms
deployment.fallback: Have manual override ready during initial deployment

hardware_notes.workspace: Set appropriate bounds for both arms to avoid collisions
hardware_notes.lighting: Consistent lighting important for vision models
